You are running an unsupported and poten: You are running an unsupported and potentially vulnerable browser.
You are strongly advised to download and: You are strongly advised to download and install the Tor Browser.
The Tor Browser includes various privacy: Tor pretraživač sadrži razna privatnosna i sigurnosna poboljšanja koja inače nisu prisutna u drugim pretraživačima.
This is the list of the other supported: This is the list of the other supported browsers:
Sending submissions over HTTPS exposes t:
Sending submissions over HTTPS exposes the act of doing so, but not the content.

Also, hiding the fact that you are submitting something makes the submission anonymous, which is strongly recommended.

This can be achieved with the use of the Tor Browser, providing anonymisation not found in other browsers like Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, Opera etc.

Configuration completed. You can review: Configuration completed. You can review the settings or enable it now.
This interface can generate a Private Ke: This interface can generate a Private Key and a Certificate Signing Request. The Certificate Signing Request can be provided to a Certificate Authority to retrieve a Certificate. After having validated your request and your ownership of the hostname, the Certificate Authority will issue you a Certificate and provide a file containing Intermediate Certificates. Load the Certificate and the file containing the Intermediate Certificates to complete the HTTPS setup.
Using automatic HTTPS configuration will: Using automatic HTTPS configuration will handle the entire process of requesting, enabling and renewing certificates from the Let's Encrypt Certificate Authority.
The platform must be reachable through a: The platform must be reachable through a public IP address and the selected hostname must have a corresponding DNS record referencing that address.
The manual configuration wizard will gui: The manual configuration wizard will guide you through the setup of HTTPS from an alternative Certificate Authority.
The platform supports the configuration: The platform supports the configuration of HTTPS through this interface.
The connection to the configured domain: The connection to the configured domain failed.
Allowing whistleblowers to connect over: Allowing whistleblowers to connect over HTTPS preserves their privacy but not their anonymity.

A useful way to hide your key code is to: Koristan način da se sakrije ključ kod je da ga zapisati kao broj kreditne kartice, odnosno uključujući i rok trajanja.

This could be a sign of an attack (for e: To bi mogao biti znak za napad (na primjer, neko preplavljuju svoj server sa lažnim informacijama) ili samo upotrebe šiljak zbog povećane vidljivosti vašeg projekta.
Examine the issue to determine whether i: Examine the issue to determine whether it is legitimate or not.
The server cannot guarantee that a new s: Server ne može garantirati da je novi podnesak mogu biti pohranjeni, tako podneske su onemogućena.
Please consider asking your technical su: Please consider asking your technical support to create more disk space on the server.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: GlobaLeaks tehnologija uključuje server status provjere komponenta koja će vas upozoriti u slučaju da nešto zahtijeva vašu pažnju.
For more information, log in to the Admi: Za više informacija, prijavite se na sučelje uprave i pogled na "System statistiku" i "anomalije" sekcije.
This is an email to inform you that the: Ovo je e-mail da vas obavijestiti da je ključni PGP sledećih korisnici će isteći ili je već istekao:
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Bez valjanog PGP ključa, sistem neće moći da ih šalju šifrirane obavijesti.

This is a test email sent out from the p: This is a test email sent out from the platform's administrative interface.

Without a valid certificate, the platfor: Without a valid certificate, the platform will be accessible in a secure way only via Tor.
Log in to solve the issue.

You're receiving this email because a pa: You're receiving this email because a password reset has been requested for your account.
If you didn't make this request, you may: If you didn't make this request, you may safely ignore and delete this email.
You can confirm your request by clicking: You can confirm your request by clicking the following links:
This is an email to inform you that your: Ovo je e-mail ti je to ključ PGP ističe ili je već istekao obavijestiti.
You should extend its validity and updat: Trebalo bi proširiti svoju valjanost i ažurirati ključ prisutan na platformi, ili uploadati novi ključ.
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Bez valjanog PGP ključa, sistem neće biti u mogućnosti da enkripciju podataka koje ste dobili.
It appears that {NodeName} is receiving: Čini se da {NodeName} prima veliki broj zahtjeva.
To prevent sending you too many emails,: Da biste spriječili slanje ste previše e-mailova, sistem je onemogućio obavijesti e-pošte dok se teret vrati u normalu. U međuvremenu, možete normalno da se prijavite na platformu i ručno provjeriti za nove argumente.
If you don’t mind and would rather recei: Ako vam ne smeta i da bi radije dobiti tako veliki broj prijava e-mail u svakom slučaju, obratite se tehničkoj podršci da ih modificirati ove postavke u skladu s tim.
Click the link to activate the platform:: Click the link to activate the platform:
It is good security practice to keep the: It is good security practice to keep the platform up to date.
To learn about new features and bug fixe: To learn about new features and bug fixes in the new version consult the change log at: {ChangeLogUrl}
For instructions on software updates, pl: For instructions on software updates, please refer to the documentation at: {UpdateGuideUrl}
Please remember to check them before the: Please remember to check them before they are deleted.
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient of their submission.
You are asked to pay special attention t: You are asked to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks in the interest of the public. Therefore the material provided within this submission should be considered to be of high importance.
